entry.title: Setup A Yara Scanner In Aws Lambda

link.title: Setup A Yara Scanner In Aws Lambda

entry.summary:
Introduction Hello everyone! I’ve been searching how AWS Lambda can be used for analyzing things for a while. So I could get a YARA Scanner that could work on the remote server without messing with the server side and it’s environment. I will explain how I setup a simple YARA Scanner in AWS Lambda in this blog. If you want to discuss or ask me something, you can reach me from twitter.
What is ...

entry.title: Configuration Extraction With Yara
entry.summary: Introduction Hello everyone! Until seeing this blog from _n1ghtw0lf, I did not know that we can use YARA rules for configuration extraction. He wrote a YARA rule for dotnet samples using dotnet and a custom module. Then, it is inspired me to do the same thing for other kinds of samples besides samples that are written in dotnet. However, I could not find any module that gets the data at the gi...
